> <OLD - Nighlight>
>
> Nightlight followed closely Rodimus and said "What?"
> she almost couldnt belive what i she listening

<NEW>

The lift finally reached its destination and the doors slid open to
reveal a large chamber!

The chamber appeared to be a cross between a ship's bridge and a
castle's throne room. There were different figures hustling and
bustling about the room, most of them not even paying attention to the
fact that DARK RODIMUS and NIGHTLIGHT had arrived.

However at the center of the room , two figures did notice.

One of them was sitting on an ornate chair, with proportions as large
as he was! Larger then either DARK RODIMUS or TUSCON this figure
looked almost muscular the way his armor was set on his frame. He
looked to be as large as OPTIMUS PRIMAL was after he had became
OPTIMAL OPTIMUS or as large as HYDRAS was now!

The second figure was smaller, standing maybe as tall as ChEETOR or
some of the other Maximals, but his presence is still powerful and
sly. He was predominantly silver with purple armor at his shins and
chest. He had wing like protruasions on his back and his cranial armor
looked almost like an Incan chieftain's headdress.

The large figure on the throne turned his head to look at DARK RODIMUS
and NIGHTLIGHT, a dark smile upon his face. "Ahhh yes, my black
knight." He said to DARK RODIMUS. "You have returned with a damsel in
distress have you?" The figure's optics turned to regard NIGHTLIGHT.

"My lord this is Nightlight, my wife." DARK RODIMUS gestured to
NIGHTLIGHT as he did so.

"Do you see lord Magmatron." The figure beside the throne said. "Our
knight thinks he has a wife now, isn't that quaint?" he smiled at
NIGHTLIGHT and DARK RODIMUS.

MAGMATRON grunted, "Quiet Saberback. We have serious matters to attend to."

"As you command Lord Magmatron." SABERBACK said as he leaned smiled at
DARK RODIMUS and leered pleasently at NIGHTLIGHT.

DARK RODIMUS stood slightly in fornt of NIGHTLIGHT in a protective
manuver as he watched SABERBACK and MAGMATRON.

"Why have you brought her here?" MAGMATRON said, his voice deep and
powerful. "Have we not been enough of a family for you?" He smiled,
although with his teeth and expression it looked more wicked than
cordial.

There was a pause as DARK RODIMUS' optics glowed strangely for a
moment. "She is my wife, I could not leave her behind."

MAGMATRON nodded as he turned his powerful gaze on NIGHTLIGHT, "You!"
He said, his deep voice reverberating across the room. "What shall we
do with you now?" He began to chuckle wickedly, "Should we let Rodimus
keep his prize, or should we dangle it in front of him while we keep
it for ourselves? hmmmmm?"

Beside him SABERBACK began to laugh.
